Each set comes with sheet masks packed with hydrating, skin-soothing ingredients like rose, cucumber, and algae extract that will soothe and calm your skin. There are also ingredients like saccharomyces ferment filtrate and adenosine that will firm your skin, even out your skin tone, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. If you are looking for smooth, hydrated skin, look no further!

*Each set includes 5 single-use sheet masks.

From snail mucin and bee venom to gold extract, these sheet masks are packed with high-power ingredients like collagen and saccharomyces ferment filtrate, well-known in Korea for their anti-aging benefits. Various fruit and flower extracts also help moisturize your skin while reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. If you’re looking to experiment with anti-aging products, or you’re hoping to create an anti-aging routine, then this is your perfect value set.

products.body_html:

This is an essence dry skin will actually drink up!

Why? Because the special formula contains an advanced form of hyaluronic acid called sodium hyaluronate that's comprised of smaller molecules, allowing it to hold 1,000 times more moisture than water. This essence sinks fast into skin and deeply infuses it with hydration.

The result? Insanely moisturized skin that looks plump, supple, and happier.

The essence is now conveniently available in two sizes: 300 ml (original) and 150 ml (new!).

Fragrance-free. According to EWG cosmetic database, this essence has a very "safe" EWG rating (score: 1).

The powerhouse ingredient is naturally abundant in nutrients like hyaluronic acid, glycoprotein enzymes and copper peptides, so it helps stimulate collagen, protects from free radicals, boosts hydration, and repairs sun damage and acne scarring.

This do-it-all gel serum, now in updated packaging, contains 62% snail mucin extract sourced from special snail farms in Chile, along with licorice root to brighten and paeonia lactiflora root to prevent signs of aging. Another star ingredient is forsythia viridissima fruit that helps reduce the appearance of pigmentation, fine lines and wrinkles.

The luxe formula is absorbent yet lightweight, so dry skin types can apply it as a serum before moisturizer, while those with oily or combination skin can use it as the last step in their routines.

Free of parabens, pigments, artificial fragrances, surfactants, mineral oils, alcohol, and cruelty free.  

pH level ~6.6-7.6

50 ml. / 1.7 fl. oz.

products.title: Peptide No-Sebum Repair Cream
products.body_html:
This moisturizer was designed with combination and sensitive skin types in mind.

The formula features ingredients that control sebum like calamine powder (which also has soothing effects) and improve cell turnover by gently removing dead skin cells like BHAs. White truffle, low molecular peptides and 20 essential amino acids and minerals also help firm and improve skin elasticity and wrinkles.

The fast-absorbing, nourishing cream keeps skin slightly acidic to help prevent bacteria from breeding and causing skin issues.

Free of parabens, pigments, artificial fragrances, animal ingredients, and mineral oil. pH level of ~6.5

 50 ml. / 1.69 fl.oz.

Featured on Cina

products.title: Cacao Moist and Mild Toner
products.body_html:
This lightweight, hydrating toner is designed for skin that’s dull, dehydrated, sensitive and overall lacking in the nourishment department. It’s packed with extracts from three parts of the cacao tree, which are rich in antioxidants, calm inflammation, and moisturize the skin. Hyaluronic acid provides an additional moisture boost.

Skin-balancing and purifying willow bark extract, soothing madecassoside, and smoothing botanical extracts round out the gentle formula.

The formula can be layered as part of the 7 Skin Method, a Korean beauty secret that involves applying your toner seven consecutive times to achieve plump, glowing skin. 

This product is free of parabens, pigments, artificial fragrances, animal ingredients, surfactants, mineral oils, volatile alcohol (ethanol, denatured alcohol), and silicone. pH level of 6.5~7.5.

150 ml./ 5.07 oz

products.title: Hi Bye Vita Peel Clear Pad
products.body_html:
Your ticket to smooth, glowing skin!

These double-sided pads gently exfoliate dead skin cells and deep clean pores with plant-sourced AHAs like lactic acid and malic acid, while replenishing moisture and brightening the complexion with antioxidant-rich ingredients like gold kiwi fruit extract. Includes 40 pads. 

 85 ml./ 2.87 oz./fl.

products.title: Pore N Turn-Over 28 ABA Toner
products.body_html:
This toner removes dead skin cells, controls sebum, and balances the skin's pH to create a smooth, radiant and non-greasy surface. The formula contains 79.42% antimicrobial tannins, as well as both AHAs and BHAs, including lactic acid (derived from fermented sugar), citrus acid (from fruit), malic acid (from apples) and salicylic acid. The patented ingredient EVERMAT™️ tightens pores and keeps excess oil at bay, while an antioxidant-rich herb extract blend soothes and protects.

The toner is perfect for those who want to minimize the appearance of pores and create an even, oil-free canvas for makeup.

This product is free of 10 harmful ingredients: Paraben, paraffin, synthetic fragrance, pigment, benzophenone, DEA, silicon, animal raw materials, mineral oil, PEG

125 ml. / 4.22 fl.oz

products.title: Pore N Tightening Essence
products.body_html:
This fast-absorbing essence takes a 360-degree approach to perfecting pores by controlling sebum, hydrating, boosting collagen and improving skin elasticity.

It's formulated with 45.34% tannin extract, which tightens pores, and EVERMAT™️, a patented ingredient that controls sebum, minimizes the appearance of pores and smoothes skin texture.

Then for moisturizing, brightening, and anti-aging benefits, the formula features adenosine, polyphenols and a V7 Complex made from a combination of powerful vitamins including retinol (vitamin A), niacinamide (vitamin B3), ascorbic acid (vitamin C), and vitamin E.

The essence is free of potential harmful ingredients like parabens, synthetic fragrance and mineral oil.

Please note since retinol (also known as vitamin A) is not considered pregnancy-safe, we don’t recommend using this product if you’re currently pregnant or breastfeeding.

30 ml. / 1.01 fl.oz

products.title: Nature Solution Hydrating Bamboo Water
products.body_html:
This nourishing toner, perfect for sensitive or dry skin types, is packed with 86.85% bamboo extract which restores and protects the skin’s moisture barrier. The powerhouse ingredient is anti-bacterial, anti-inflammatory and high in antioxidants, too.

It's also rich in ECOCERT certified organic ingredients and 15 kinds of natural oils like sunflower seed oil and olive oil that smooth, hydrate, and offer anti-aging benefits.

The double-layer formula replenishes moisture levels and prevents future moisture loss by forming an oil barrier over skin. Skin immediately feels soft and supple after use.

 150 ml. / 5.0 fl.oz

products.title: Acsen Pore Control Mask
products.body_html:
Specifically suited to help clear and soothe acne-prone skin, this mask gently removes impurities and deep cleans pores without making skin feel dry, tight or sensitive.

A mixture of Moroccan lava, kaolin and bentonite clays purifies and detoxes pores, while centella asiatica extract ensures a reduction in inflammation and acne scarring. Results are a brighter, cleaner, and firmer complexion.

Try it as a spot treatment on stubborn breakouts.

50 ml./1.69 oz fl.

products.title: Acsen TOC Toner
products.body_html:
As we age, our natural cell turnover slows down, which can cause a buildup of pore-clogging dead skin cells and make the complexion look dull. This gentle yet effective toner speeds up that turnover to reveal clear, healthier skin, hence the “TOC” in its name, which stands for - you guessed it - turn over cycle.

The toner is part of the brand’s Acsen line, which is created with acne-prone and sensitive skin-types in mind, so the formula contains just enough glycolic acid and sulfur to exfoliate skin and prevent and target breakouts, but not enough to cause irritation. Those with sensitive skin will also benefit from centella asiatica and portulaca oleracea, plant extracts that have soothing properties.

Try using it as a spot treatment for acne by applying a product-soaked cotton pad over the affected area until dry.

100 ml, 3.38 oz fl . pH level of this product ~5

products.title: A'PIEU Daily Sheet Mask - Green Tea
products.body_html:
Green tea may have an energizing effect on your mind, but it has a calming effect on your skin when applied topically. In these green tea antioxidant-infused sheet masks, aloe vera extract provides additional soothing effects, while bamboo extract purifies and tea tree leaf extract reduces the appearance of pores.

The pack contains 33 sheet masks that are meant to be worn daily. The masks are housed in a single tub to be eco-friendly (less waste!) and can be pulled out for use with the included mini tweezers.

Made with cotton Tencel fibers, the masks effectively adhere to the skin so you can move around for the 15-20 minute wear.

 350g. 

*Final Sale

products.title: A'PIEU NonCo Tea Tree Tok Powder
products.body_html:
Acne treatments that are gentle on the skin DO exist!

In this powder, tea tree oil is paired with healing ingredients like madecassoside and centella asiatica extract so it soothes as it banishes breakouts.

The powder formula quickly absorbs into skin making it perfect for use as an on-the-go spot treatment.

3g.

products.title: A'PIEU NonCo Tea Tree Stick
products.body_html:
Consider this your magic, acne-fighting wand!

The convenient doe-foot applicator makes it easy to target trouble spots and the formula, that includes tea tree oil and a blend of anti-inflammatory herbal extracts like chamomile and lavender, effectively diminishes and heals pimples. The serum dries quickly so it can be worn under makeup and reapplied as needed.

0.3 fl.oz/ 8 ml.

products.title: Shampoo
products.body_html:
Achieving fuller, longer and healthier hair starts with your scalp.

AMH, which fittingly stands for Add More Hair, was developed with doctors and contains ingredients like salicylic acid and zinc pyrithione that exfoliate the scalp, get rid of dandruff, alleviate seborrheic dermatitis and improve general scalp health. The result? Hair growth and the prevention of hair loss, plus soft and silky strands (thanks to panthenol, derivative of vitamin b5).

The luxe yet effective cleansing shampoo is formulated with herbal extracts, giving it a stress-relieving, spa-like scent.

No wonder it has a big celebrity following in Korea!

16.9 fl. oz, 500 ml. This product has a ph level of ~7.7. 

***Contains Sulfate.

products.title: SoonJung Cica Balm-Panthensoside 5
products.body_html:
Soothe and hydrate skin with this innovative balm that contains a collection of calming and hydrating ingredients.

Panthenol, a skin-benefitting compound closely related to Vitamin B5, delivers deep hydration while madecassoside, derived from Centella asiatica, repairs skin damage. The addition of cica, a compressed and more concentrated version of centella asiatica and madecassoside, helped further calm and soothe irritated skin.

When skin is in need of deep moisture and repair, reach for this balm.

1.35 fl. oz. / 40 ml

products.title: Floral Essential Serum
products.body_html:
The star ingredient in this everyday serum is 81.2% fermented honeysuckle complex, created after undergoing a one-year fermentation process. The process makes the ingredient rich in powerful antioxidants and helps firm skin and improve uneven tone. The radiance-boosting formula, which smells faintly of the sweet flower, absorbs quickly, yet makes skin feel instantly silky.

Free of mineral oil, raw animal material, tar pigment and silicone oil. Vegan-certified. Learn more here. 

3.38 fl oz./ 100 ml.

products.title: Petal Spa Oil To Foam Cleanser
products.body_html:
Whether you’re new to the double cleanse method or are short on time or counter space, this oil to foam cleanser simplifies things. The one-and-done formula, which contains soapberry extract, a natural surfactant, effectively sweeps away foundation, sunscreen and impurities without drying out skin. Damask rose oil provides a gorgeous natural scent and skin-calming and nourishing effects. 

The oil formula transforms into a creamy foam when activated with water, turning the simple step into a spa-like experience.

The cleanser comes with both a cap and a pump, making it travel-friendly, too.

Free of mineral oil, raw animal material, tar pigment and silicone oil. Vegan-certified. Suitable for all skin types. pH level of 6.6 ~8.6. Learn more here. 

5.92 oz / 175 ml.

Featured on Buzzfeed

Soko Glam Best of K-Beauty™ Award Winner for 2019

+ See why this product is a 2019 Soko Glam Best of K-Beauty™ Winner.

products.title: Floral Hydro Eye Gel Cream
products.body_html:
Applying this refreshing gel formula feels like giving your undereye area a cold drink of water on a hot day. Don’t be fooled by its lightweight texture - the formula, which contains narcissus flower extracts, packs a punch.

The Dutch Master narcissus flower is able to retain moisture in its bulbs through the winter and spring before blooming in the summer. These hydration-locking powers are put to use in this eye cream resulting in a plump, rejuvenated appearance.

Free of mineral oil, raw animal material, tar pigment and silicone oil. Vegan-certified. Suitable for all skin types. ph level 5.5 ~7.5. Learn more here.

 0.68 fl oz. / 20 ml.

products.title: No 5.5 pH Balancing Micro Cleansing Foam
products.body_html:
With a low pH level, this cleanser effectively removes dust and impurities from skin while keeping it in a healthy, balanced state. 


The hypoallergenic, sensitive skin-friendly formula contains licorice root extract to protect skin from environmental stressors and allantoin to soothe and moisturize.

140 ml. / 4.7 fl. oz.

products.title: Rich Moist Soothing Tencel Sheet Mask
products.body_html:
One of our best selling masks is back and better than ever!

The formula of this popular mask has recently been upgraded and now offers a 360-degree approach to treating dry or sensitive skin. The essence is packed with ceramides help strengthen a weakened skin barrier, while aloe vera and centella asiatica extract provide a calming effect. 

25 ml. / 0.85 fl. oz. 

*All single sheet masks are final sale.

products.title: Midnight Blue Calming Sheet Mask
products.body_html:
Meet your new sunburn savior! This sheet mask not only soothes irritation with ingredients like willow bark and centella asiatica extracts, but actually lowers the skin’s temperature with the help of erythritol.

Bonus: The sheet mask itself is made from bamboo charcoal to draw out impurities from pores, which is perfect for those with large pores.

 25 ml. / 0.85 fl. oz.

*All single sheet masks are final sale

products.title: DW-EGF Derma Roller Program Special Kit
products.body_html:
Use this kit that includes a seven-day supply of Easydew DW-EGF Derma Oneshot Ampoule and the brand’s weekly dissolving microneedling treatment for a more youthful and glowing complexion. The “needles”, made of crystallized serum, measure 0.25mm, a length that’s mild on skin and helps boost the absorption of skincare products.

The products feature EGF, a protein that promotes cell regeneration to target signs of aging and brighten skin on the cellular level. The Easydew EX contains the highest purity of EGF known in the market, so you can be sure you’re effectively targeting wrinkles with each application.

After one week (or use of one kit), expect a brighter, more even complexion. Best results - an improvement in the appearance of deep wrinkles on the forehead, between eyebrows, on the neck, and around the eyes and mouth - are seen after four weekly treatments.

Pro tip: If your skin is extremely sensitive, consider working your way up to this treatment with Easydew’s Repair Control line.

This kit includes:

  • 1 Needle roller (reusable) 
  • 1 Needle puff (one time use)
  • 7 Daily Ampoules  1.2 ml./ 0.04 fl. oz. each

Replenishments of the needle shot  and the ampoule are available for separate purchase. Learn more here. 

**** Never use the derma roller on broken or infected skin or on active breakouts. Doing so can cause further irritation or bacteria to spread.

Featured on Brit + Co

products.title: DW-EGF Derma Oneshot Ampoule
products.body_html:
This concentrated ampoule packs a one-two punch, tackling both wrinkles and hyperpigmentation. It contains 1ppm of EGF, a protein that promotes cell regeneration to target signs of aging and brighten skin on the cellular level.

Easydew EX contains the highest purity of EGF known in the market, so you can be sure you’re effectively targeting wrinkles and dark spots with each application.

Additional ingredients like niacinamide and hyaluronic acid help to promote a more hydrated and plumper complexion. It can be used all over the face - including the delicate eye area - by all skin types and is free of parabens, mineral oils, and silicones.

To boost results, combine use of the ampoule with the brand’s DW-EGF Derma Needle 3000 Shot Roller (sold separately), a dissolving microneedling treatment.

This kit contains 7 ampoules 1.2 ml / 0.04 fl. oz. each. Suitable for all skin types. 

Learn more here.

products.title: PhytoCELL Cell Revival Cica Cream
products.body_html:
﻿﻿This cream harnesses the power of four centella asiatica-derived ingredients including madecassoside and madecassic acid that are known to calm redness, inflammation and irritation, making it a must-have for sensitive skin types. Antioxidant-rich edelweiss extract and hydrating panthenol round out the skin-benefitting ingredient list.

The formula absorbs quickly into skin without leaving a greasy residue and is thermal sensitive, meaning that it adjusts to the skin’s temperature to strengthen its barrier and protect against environmental stressors.

The Re:p PhytoCELL line is formulated to soothe skin, strengthen the skin barrier, and provide anti-aging benefits. The star ingredient in the collection’s products is bristle-tip edelweiss, sourced from Korea for its ability to aid in cell production and boost the energy and vitality of the skin.

Free of parabens, artificial fragrance, animal ingredients, mineral oils. Suitable for all skin types. pH level of ~6.2

50 ml./ 1.7 fl. oz.

products.title: Trouble Cure
products.body_html:
Welcome to the next generation of pimple patches! As featured on The Strategist 

This two-step acne treatment is made to tackle deep, hard-to-reach hormonal pimples.

First, sanitize and treat the bacteria with a pad that contains salicylic acid and tea tree leaf oil.Then apply the unique pimple patch to the blemish. This patch contains innovative microneedle technology to truly infuse skin with hard-working ingredients, including hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and oligopeptide-76, that dig deep into the blemish and attack bacteria and inflammation faster than other pimple patches. Each microneedle is thinner than 1/3 the width of a hair, making the entire process painless and actually satisfying.

You'll wake up with a calmed, flattened cystic blemish that will heal faster.

1 Box includes:
6 Swabs
6 Patches
Free of fragrances, parabens, mineral oils, and silicone. Learn more here.  

*This product is final sale.

products.title: Marine Moisture Mineral Mask Single
products.body_html:
It's time to get your moisture levels back in balance! This cotton sheet mask adheres close to skin to transfer the nutrient-packed essence into skin. The formula contains the brand's patented "Aqua Seal" technology that contains five types of hyaluronic acid, an intensely hydrating ingredient, and ensures moisture isn't lost from skin and as well as a collection of marine-sourced extracts, including sea water and kelp extract, to offer brightening effects.

*All sheet masks are Final Sale.  

23 ml. / 0.81 oz.
